name: Backyard Brat Free
description:
You are a kid with a remote-control helicopter, up to absolutely no good, whatsoever.

The full version of Backyard Brat offers 25 levels.

Backyard Brat Free gives you 10 levels, offering challenges that include dropping water bombs on the angry neighbor as he barbecues, and dropping firecrackers on parents' heads. Backyard Brat is intended for all ages.
